text: Godfrey of Namur (attested in 1080; died 19 August 1139) was a Lotharingian nobleman. He was Count of Porc√©an from 1097 until his death. From 1102, he was also Count of Namur. He was the oldest son of Count Albert III and his wife Ida of Saxony, the heiress of Laroche. Category:1130s deaths Category:1080s births Category:Counts of Namur
title: Godfrey I, Count of Namur
